titleStmt.title: Our ancient testimony renewed concerning our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ, the Holy Scriptures, and the Resurrection occasioned at this time by several unjust charges published against us, and our truly Christian profession, by G. Keith ... / given forth by a meeting of publick Friends, and others, at Philadelphia in Pennsylvania.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle ...,

notesStmt.note: Running title: "The general history of the Quakers."
Imperfect: pages stained and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
